AT.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
AT.description: Die Pikmin sind sonderbare Wesen – sie scheinen halb Tier und halb Pflanze zu sein, und aus ihren Köpfen wachsen Blätter und Blüten. Zusammen mit Captain Olimar, einem Entdecker aus dem All, der aus heiterem Himmel bei den Pikmin gelandet war, durchforsten sie ihren Planeten nach Schätzen. Eigentlich haben die Pikmin ihre Wurzeln in der Welt der Videospiele, aber hier wurden sie aus ihrer gewohnten Umgebung gepflückt und in die Welt des computeranimierten Films geworfen! Sie treten in drei Kurzfilmen auf: in „Saftiger Schreck“ sehen wir Olimar bei der Zubereitung seines liebsten Getränkes, in „Schatz in der Flasche“ machen die Pikmin eine höchst kuriose Entdeckung, und in „Ein harter Tag“ erleben wir sie in der gefährlichen Umgebung einer Baustelle. Alle drei Filme stehen in HD zur Verfügung! Hinweis: Die Inhalte der Nintendo 3DS-Version und der Wii U-Version von PIKMIN Short Movies sind identisch.

AU.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
AU.description: The Pikmin are curious creatures – seemingly part animal and part plant, with leaves and flowers that sprout from the tops of their heads. They spend their days roaming around their planet, hunting for treasure with Captain Olimar, a space explorer who originally arrived as an unexpected guest. The Pikmin are usually only encountered in the realm of video games, but on this occasion they have been plucked from their natural environment and thrown into the world of computer animation! They’re starring in three short movies: in “The Night Juicer”, we see Captain Olimar preparing his favourite drink, in “Treasure in a Bottle” the Pikmin encounter a most peculiar treasure, and in the grand spectacle of “Occupational Hazards”, we watch as the Pikmin deal with some very perilous work conditions on a building site. All three movies can be enjoyed in glorious HD! Please Note: The Nintendo 3DS and Wii U versions of the PIKMIN Short Movies are identical in terms of content.

BG.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
BG.description: The Pikmin are curious creatures – seemingly part animal and part plant, with leaves and flowers that sprout from the tops of their heads. All three movies can be enjoyed in glorious HD! Please Note: The Nintendo 3DS and Wii U versions of the PIKMIN Short Movies are identical in terms of content.

BE.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
BE.description: Moitié animaux, moitié plantes, les Pikmin sont de drôles de créatures avec leurs feuilles et leurs fleurs sur la tête ! Aux côtés du capitaine Olimar, l'explorateur de l'espace inopinément débarqué sur leur planète, ils passent leur temps à sillonner les alentours à la recherche de trésors. Si l'on ne rencontre normalement les sympathiques Pikmin que dans le monde des jeux vidéo, les voilà cette fois-ci extirpés de leur habitat naturel et propulsés dans celui du cinéma d'animation le temps de trois courts-métrages. Dans « Le jus de la peur », nous assistons à la préparation de la boisson favorite du capitaine Olimar ; dans « Trésor en bouteille », les Pikmin découvrent un trésor des plus inhabituels, et dans « Les risques du métier », nous les retrouvons sur un chantier aux prises avec des conditions de travail plus que périlleuses. Découvrez ces trois courts-métrages en HD ! Remarque : Les versions Wii U et Nintendo 3DS des courts-métrages sont identiques en termes de contenu.

ES.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
ES.description: Los Pikmin son seres muy peculiares, mitad animales y mitad plantas, con hojas y flores que les brotan de la cabeza. Se pasan el día de aquí para allá en busca de tesoros con el capitán Olimar, un explorador espacial que un buen día apareció en su planeta. Normalmente los Pikmin solo existen en los videojuegos, pero en esta ocasión los hemos sacado de su hábitat natural para llevarlos al mundo de la animación por ordenador. Serán los protagonistas de tres cortometrajes: en «Zumo a medianoche» veremos al capitán Olimar preparar su bebida favorita; en «Tesoro embotellado» los Pikmin se toparán con un tesoro de lo más extraño; y en «Un día duro» los veremos en una obra en la que tendrán que enfrentarse a unas condiciones de trabajo muy peligrosas. ¡Podréis disfrutar de los tres cortometrajes en alta definición! Nota: El contenido de PIKMIN Short Movies es el mismo en las versiones de Nintendo 3DS y Wii U.

IT.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
IT.description: I Pikmin sono creature misteriose, un po' animali e un po' piante, a cui crescono foglioline e fiorellini in testa. Passano le loro giornate alla ricerca di tesori insieme al capitano Olimar, un esploratore spaziale atterrato casualmente sul loro pianeta. Normalmente i Pikmin si possono vedere in azione solo nel mondo dei videogiochi, ma per questa occasione speciale sono entrati in un cartone animato in grafica digitale! E così sono diventati i protagonisti di tre cortometraggi animati in alta definizione. In "Un succo di paura", vedrete il capitano Olimar preparare il suo frullato preferito. In "Tesoro in bottiglia", i Pikmin troveranno un tesoro piuttosto particolare. Infine, "I rischi del mestiere" vi mostrerà i Pikmin al lavoro in un cantiere davvero pericoloso! Nota: il contenuto delle versioni per Nintendo 3DS e Wii U dei PIKMIN Short Movies è identico.

NL.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
NL.description: De Pikmin zijn vreemde wezentjes, deels dier, deels plant, en er groeien bladeren en bloemen uit hun hoofd. Meestal zijn ze op jacht naar schatten met kapitein Olimar, een ontdekkingsreiziger die per ongeluk op hun planeet terechtkwam. Normaal gesproken kom je Pikmin alleen tegen in games, maar nu zijn ze uit hun natuurlijke omgeving geplukt en in de wereld van computeranimaties beland! Ze spelen de hoofdrol in drie korte filmpjes: in 'The Night Juicer' zien we hoe kapitein Olimar zijn favoriete drankje klaarmaakt, in 'Treasure in a Bottle' komen de Pikmin een vreemde schat tegen, en in het spectaculaire 'Occupational Hazards' zien we hoe de Pikmin met gevaarlijke werkomstandigheden op een bouwplaats omgaan. Je kunt alle drie de filmpjes in prachtig HD bekijken! Opmerking: de Nintendo 3DS- en Wii U-versies van de PIKMIN Short Movies zijn inhoudelijk identiek.

NZ.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
NZ.description: The Pikmin are curious creatures – seemingly part animal and part plant, with leaves and flowers that sprout from the tops of their heads. They spend their days roaming around their planet, hunting for treasure with Captain Olimar, a space explorer who originally arrived as an unexpected guest. The Pikmin are usually only encountered in the realm of video games, but on this occasion they have been plucked from their natural environment and thrown into the world of computer animation! They’re starring in three short movies: in “The Night Juicer”, we see Captain Olimar preparing his favourite drink, in “Treasure in a Bottle” the Pikmin encounter a most peculiar treasure, and in the grand spectacle of “Occupational Hazards”, we watch as the Pikmin deal with some very perilous work conditions on a building site. All three movies can be enjoyed in glorious HD! Please Note: The Nintendo 3DS and Wii U versions of the PIKMIN Short Movies are identical in terms of content.

PT.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
PT.description: Os Pikmin são criaturas muito peculiares – metade animal, metade planta – com folhas e flores que despontam do topo da cabeça. Passam os dias a vaguear pelo seu planeta, à procura de tesouros com o Captain Olimar, um explorador espacial que apareceu no planeta de forma inesperada. Normalmente, só é possível encontrar Pikmin em videojogos, mas, nesta ocasião, foram retirados do seu ambiente natural e introduzidos no mundo da animação por computador! Como é óbvio, os Pikmin são as estrelas de três curtas-metragens: em "The Night Juicer" (Sumo a meio da noite), podemos ver o Captain Olimar a preparar a sua bebida favorita, em "Treasure in a Bottle" (Tesouro na garrafa), os Pikmin deparam-se com um tesouro muito peculiar e, em "Occupational Hazard" (Ossos do ofício), podemos assistir às peripécias dos Pikmin enquanto trabalham num estaleiro de construção. Todas as curtas-metragens podem ser visualizadas em alta definição! Nota: As versões dos PIKMIN Short Movies para a Nintendo 3DS e para a Wii U são idênticas em termos de conteúdo.

RU.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
RU.description: Пикмины — необычные существа, принадлежащие как животному, так и растительному миру: у них на макушке растут листья или цветы. Целыми днями они путешествуют по своей планете, разыскивая сокровища с капитаном Олимаром — космическим исследователем, который как-то раз нежданным гостем прибыл издалека. Как правило, пикмины встречаются в видеоиграх, но в этот раз они покинули привычную среду обитания и, попав в мир компьютерной мультипликации, стали героями трех короткометражных фильмов! В «The Night Juicer» («Ночная соковыжималка») капитан Олимар делает свой любимый напиток, а «Treasure in a Bottle» («Сокровище в бутылке») повествует об удивительной находке пикиминов. Наконец, захватывающий сюжет «Occupational Hazards» («Вредная работа») рассказывает об опасностях, поджидающих пикминов на стройплощадке. Все три фильма доступны в великолепном HD-качестве! Примечание. Содержание версий PIKMIN Short Movies для Nintendo 3DS и Wii U идентично.

SE.name: PIKMIN Short Movies HD
SE.description: The Pikmin are curious creatures – seemingly part animal and part plant, with leaves and flowers that sprout from the tops of their heads. They spend their days roaming around their planet, hunting for treasure with Captain Olimar, a space explorer who originally arrived as an unexpected guest. The Pikmin are usually only encountered in the realm of video games, but on this occasion they have been plucked from their natural environment and thrown into the world of computer animation! They’re starring in three short movies: in “The Night Juicer”, we see Captain Olimar preparing his favourite drink, in “Treasure in a Bottle” the Pikmin encounter a most peculiar treasure, and in the grand spectacle of “Occupational Hazards”, we watch as the Pikmin deal with some very perilous work conditions on a building site. All three movies can be enjoyed in glorious HD! Please Note: The Nintendo 3DS and Wii U versions of the PIKMIN Short Movies are identical in terms of content.
